title: ACE COMBAT 6
description: With over 10 million copies sold worldwide,  the ultimate flight action series soars onto  the Xbox 360!   Witness high definition graphics rendering  the world around you into super realistic war  zones, made possible only by next generation  processing power. Lead not only aerial combat  units but also naval and ground combat units  to victory.   Massive conflicts unfold on a “living battlefield”  integrated by the “Dynamic Operation System”  where up to six independent aerial, ground,  and naval battles can break out at once as  allies and enemies clash in real-time.   The long awaited Online-Mode has finally  arrived! Prove your supremacy on a global  scale in the intense Xbox Live multi-player online mode!  For the first time in the Ace Combat franchise, several modes  of online play with various rules are available,  including death match style missions,  team death matches and co-op games.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: A-10A -DISTANT THUNDER-
childDownloads.description: A-10A Thunderbolt II, Distant Thunder Aircraft Now Available! An aircraft with a thoroughly reworked design and anti-aircraft capability that allows it to hold its own in air combat. Although less durable than the previous design, this aircraft features an increased weapons payload. Use your increased firepower to strike down the enemy like a bolt of lightning! Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect the content of Aircraft <PACK09>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as Emmerian colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: A-10A -THE IDOLMASTER SP-
childDownloads.description: A-10A ThunderBolt II, "THE IDOLMASTER SP" Aircraft Now Available! The stars of the hit game THE IDOLMASTER make their Ace Combat debut! Twelfth up is the staff of 765 Productions! This unusual aircraft from our friends at 765 Productions makes flying fun! We can't wait to take this baby for a test flight! Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect the content of Aircraft <PACK10>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as Emmerian colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: A-10A -THUNDER SHARK-
childDownloads.description: A-10A ThunderBolt II, Shark Mouth Aircraft Now Available!  Severe sacrifices have been made to speed and maneuverability to facilitate an unprecedented number of armaments. The Shark Mouth is one of the most recognized of all nose art. Lay waste to your enemies with more than enough ammo to spare!  Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect  the content of Aircraft <PACK02>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as default colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: A-10A -XMAS-
childDownloads.description: A-10A ThunderBolt II, Holiday Aircraft Now Available!  Seemingly unaffected by gravity, even during inverted flight, exceptional aerodynamic performance is achieved at the loss of this aircraft's otherwise characteristic durability. This A-10A is something else altogether. Witness its magical maneuverability on a cold winter's night, and one could easily mistake it for a reindeer and a sleigh.  Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect  the content of Aircraft <PACK03>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as default colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: ACE COMBAT 6 CAMPAIGN MODE DEMO
childDownloads.description: A massive enemy swarms over the city, shattering the peace. Amidst the chaos a pilot takes to the skies. Against countless enemies and cannon fire, he heads into the fray. ACE COMBAT 6 CAMPAIGN MODE DEMO AVAILABLE NOW! A full scale war unfolds against a backdrop of breathtaking vistas. Detailed cities and sweeping landscapes reach out as far as the eye can see. Experience the roar of acceleration as you carve through swarms of enemy pilots, twisting missile trails and shattering explosions. Download the ACE COMBAT 6 CAMPAIGN DEMO, and strap yourself in for the next evolution in ACE COMBAT! (English Voice/Subtitles)

childDownloads.description: A Picture Pack featuring  the main character's F-15E Strike Eagle and HUD aircraft icons. The green, yellow and red HUD aircraft icons reflect the amount of damage your aircraft has taken. Try changing the color of the icon to match your mood. Has today been smooth flying, or have you taken a lot of flack? There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: ACE COMBAT 6 TRAILER #02 Full Trailer
childDownloads.description: ACE COMBAT 6 full trailer available now!  The paths of  a broken family, a fallen ace, a scheming soldier and a fated pilot intertwine, as they struggle to overcome the intense flames of war.  Swarms of fighter jets race across the horizon as massive missile explosions blanket the sky. Take part in the intense drama of the battlefield, and witness Ace Combat redefined!

childDownloads.title: ACE OF ACES MISSION 01
childDownloads.description: A challenge exclusively for masters of Ace Combat. Exceeding that of ACE, Mission 01 is now available on the highest difficulty level, Ace of Aces. Protect Gracemeria from the reinforced Estovakian invasion.  New Counter-Charge System! When you see the Mission timer, that's your chance to increased Allied Support! Destroy the enemy within the time limit, to secure more allied numbers. The greater the number of enemies destroyed, the greater the number of allies who come to your aid. Time your kills right, and break through even the toughest enemy line.  *Campaign Mode, Mission 01 must be cleared, and Free Mission Save Data available to use this download content. *Select Ace of Aces via Free Mission after download to play. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: ACE OF ACES MISSION 02
childDownloads.description: A challenge exclusively for masters of Ace Combat. Exceeding that of ACE, Mission 02 is now available on the highest difficulty level, Ace of Aces.  Hold back the unrelenting enemy onslaught, and save Vitoze, the last remaining Emmerian stronghold.  New Counter-Charge System! Allied reinforcements are rewarded based on the number of enemies downed during the time limit. Call in Allied Support, and destroy the enemy!  New enemy ECM reported! A detrimental effect on missile performance has been reported, but details remain scarce. Stay alert!  *Campaign Mode, Mission 01 must be cleared, and Free Mission Save Data available to use this download content. *Select Ace of Aces via Free Mission after download to play. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: BATTLE ROYALE DL 1
childDownloads.description: New Online Battle, Battle Royale Now Available! A maximum of 16 players can take part in this South Sea Battle Royale amongst heavy command cruisers. Avoid the Gyges and Kottos barrage, and strike down the opposition!  *Select Player Match via Online Battle after download to play. (This system is not available in Ranked Match) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: CFA-44 -ACES-
childDownloads.description: CFA-44 Nosferatu, ACES Aircraft Now Available! Emblazoned with the logo of the Ace Combat development team, this fighter boasts a streamlined payload and excellent maneuverability. After all, a remarkable sense of control is the sign of a true ace! Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect the content of Aircraft <PACK10>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as Emmerian colors.

childDownloads.title: CFA-44 -PROTOTYPE-
childDownloads.description: CFA-44 Nosferatu, Prototype Aircraft Now Available! Ace Combat 6 ace pilot Ilya Pasternak's experimental aircraft. A stability centric design facilitates a fully maximized EML weapon system. Slice through the atmosphere, and vaporize anything caught in your sites! Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect the content of Aircraft <PACK04>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as Emmerian colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: CO-OP BATTLE DL 1
childDownloads.description: New Online CO-OP BATTLE Stage Now Available!  Join up to four other players in hunting down the enemy forces scattered across the canyon. The primary mission consists of four individually timed successive operations. Progression to the next operation can be achieved without destroying all TGTs within the time limit. However, successfully destroying all TGTs will lead to increased fortifications during the secondary mission, and a chance to score bigger points. Work with your wingmen to successfully clear all operations, and unleash the full power of Ragno Fortress!  *Select Player Match via Online Battle after download to play. (This system is not available in Ranked Match) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: CO-OP BATTLE DL 2
childDownloads.description: New Online CO-OP BATTLE Stage Now Available!  Join up to four other players over the frozen arctic as you endeavor to conquer the Chandelier doomsday weapon!  The modified cooling units quickly come back online once deactivated. Swiftly taking out all units offers the only promise of victory. Once the subsequent back-up cooling units are offline the cannon will open, offering a momentary chance to strike at the core. Destroy the Chandelier, and end the war once and for all! Team work is of the essence!  *Select Player Match via Online Battle after download to play. (This system is not available in Ranked Match) There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: DARK, SHINING SET
childDownloads.description: Dark, Shining Set (2 Aircraft) Now Available! Two aircraft including F-2A (Black), Rafale M (Gold). Modified sky painting aircraft for shows and exhibitions, these aircraft are equipped with colored smoke missiles. With a maximized missile payload, the sky is your canvas! Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect the content of Aircraft <PACK09>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as Emmerian colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.description: F-117A Night Hawk, THE IDOLMASTER Yukiho Hagiwara Aircraft Now Available!  The stars of the hit game "THE IDOLMASTER" make their Ace Combat debut! The second up is the shy but eager Yukiho Hagiwara. It's up to you to steer her to stardom before she stumbles and falls. One can hardly wait to see how fast and free she can fly.  Once downloaded other player aircraft will also reflect  the content of Aircraft <PACK03>, otherwise other player aircraft will appear as default colors. There are no refunds for this item.
